text: A giant crow Mhorriníon may ride to battle. No other giant crows have ever been seen in Albion and its origin remains a mystery.
The inhabitants of Albion ride horses to battle who are as temperamental and hardy as their riders.
Whenever the battlefield is suitable, the nobility of Albion will enter battle on deadly chariots.
